name: xmoto-web
description: X-Moto Web - WebAssembly port of the physics-based motocross game

scripts.build:wasm:debug: npm run cmake:configure:debug && npm run cmake:build:debug
scripts.build:wasm:release: npm run cmake:configure:release && npm run cmake:build:release
scripts.cmake:configure:debug: mkdir -p build/debug && cd build/debug && emcmake cmake ../../emscripten -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug
scripts.cmake:configure:release: mkdir -p build/release && cd build/release && emcmake cmake ../../emscripten -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
scripts.cmake:build:debug: cd build/debug && emmake make -j$(nproc 2>/dev/null || sysctl -n hw.ncpu 2>/dev/null || echo 4)
scripts.cmake:build:release: cd build/release && emmake make -j$(nproc 2>/dev/null || sysctl -n hw.ncpu 2>/dev/null || echo 4)
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm:debug && npm run serve

author: X-Moto Team
